channel.title: Cointelegraph.com News
channel.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest news and analyses on the future of money.

image.title: Cointelegraph.com News
image.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest news and analyses on the future of money.

item.title: Moonbirds creator Kevin Rose loses $1.1M+ in NFTs after 1 wrong move
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brayden Lindrea
item.description: Among the nonfungible tokens (NFTs) stolen from the PROOF co-founder were 25 Chromie Squiggles and one Autoglyph NFT.

item.title: Circle denies blaming SEC for shuttered $9B plan to go public
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Luke Huigsloot
item.description: A Jan. 25 report from the Financial Times which was widely shared characterized Circle as having "blamed" the SEC for its "jettisoned" public listing plan.

item.title: Crypto lawyers to be in demand as regulatory pressure reaches boiling point
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brayden Lindrea
item.description: Commercial lawyers with a solid knowledge of blockchain and crypto tech will be in particularly high demand.

item.title: Elon Musk's Tesla held onto its Bitcoin in Q4 despite market turbulence
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Jesse Coghlan
item.description: The EV maker continued to hold its estimated 9,720 Bitcoin, only losing $34 million on its investment due to price declines towards the end of 2022.

item.title: White House science office calls for comments on its digital asset research agenda
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: The office’s request for information is the latest piece in the massive research agenda in President Biden’s executive order on digital asset development.

item.title: Ireland’s central bank governor calls for ban on crypto ads targeting young adults: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: Gabriel Makhlouf reportedly said there was an “uncomfortable” level of crypto advertisements targeting young adults.

item.title: 'Victims of Ankr exploit' group unhappy with 50% reimbursement
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Blackstone
item.description: The group claims they are being discriminated against because they are liquidity providers for rival coins.

item.title: DCG companies have laid off over 500 employees as contagion spreads
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: Cryptocurrency exchange Luno fired 330 employees on Jan. 25, joining other DCG companies in cutting headcounts.

item.title: Price analysis 1/25: BTC, ETH, BNB, XRP, ADA, DOGE, MATIC, DOT, LTC, AVAX
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Rakesh Upadhyay
item.description: Bitcoin and the wider crypto market began to correct after the bullish momentum that drove last week’s rally to year-to-date highs started to fizzle out.

item.title: Binance tightens NFT rules: Nifty Newsletter, Jan. 18–24
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: Lawyers believe that NFT court orders could help reach defendants that cannot be contacted using ordinary means.

item.title: South Korean prosecutors request arrest warrant for Bithumb owner: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: One of the country’s largest crypto exchanges has fallen under investigators’ scrutiny over allegations of embezzlement by company executives.

item.title: Why is Bitcoin price down today?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Kyle White
item.category: why is the crypto market down
is crypto in a bear market
when will bitcoin price go up
item.description: Bitcoin price is down today after reaching a 2023 high above $23,300. Was the rally a bull trap and what will it take for BTC to regain its bullish momentum?

item.title: Hackers take over Robinhood’s Twitter account to promote scam token
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: A since-removed tweet called on Robinhood's 1.1 million Twitter followers to each pay $0.0005 for a token called ‘RBH’ on the Binance Smart Chain.

item.title: $1.48B in Bitcoin options expire on Friday — Will BTC hold $22K?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marcel Pechman
item.description: BTC price has started to correct, and with $1.48 billion in Bitcoin options expiring on Jan. 27, traders are watching to see if the price holds above $22,000.

item.title: Judge denies motions from Celsius users seeking to reclaim assets
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: Two claimants called out former Celsius CEO Alex Mashinsky in motions, claiming he misled users, while all suggested that the platform’s terms of use left assets in their control.

item.title: Venture capital investments into blockchain continue to free-fall: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Cointelegraph Research
item.description: Q4 2022 saw investment capital inflows of $2.3 billion, continuing the trend since April sparked by the collapse of Terra and subsequent fallout.

item.title: Exclusive NFT presale to treat all the hard workers, feat. Snoop Dogg and Billy Ray Cyrus
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Cointelegraph
item.description: Metaverse platform Animal Concerts, Cointelegraph, The Avila Brothers, Billy Ray Cyrus and Snoop Dogg are celebrating blue-collar workers with a new NFT collection.

item.title: Nifty Gateway co-founders resign amid Gemini woes
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: Nifty Gateway was founded in 2018 and acquired by Gemini in 2019.

item.title: Bitcoin due for shake-up vs. gold, stocks as BTC price dips under $22.5K
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: Bitcoin is still in line for a breakout, analysis concludes, as short-term weakness sees BTC price fall below $22,500.

item.title: Film review: ‘Human B’ shows a personal journey with Bitcoin
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Joseph Hall
item.description: A review of a predominantly German-language film that challenges the misconceptions and misunderstandings surrounding Bitcoin.

item.title: NFT creator: Amber Vittoria crushes it in her ‘Big Girl Pants’
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Greg Oakford
item.description: Named on Forbes 30 under 30, Amber Vittoria made a big splash in the traditional art world and has since embraced NFTs, collaborating with The Hundreds, World of Women and as MoonPay’s ‘artist in residence.’ Pranksy is a fan and her work has notched up over 1,350ETH in secondary sales on OpenSea alone.

item.title: Injective launches $150M ecosystem fund to boost DeFi, Cosmos adoption
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Sam Bourgi
item.description: “DeFi has proven to be a resilient and reliable option for users in the face of the overarching CeFi collapse in 2022,” said Eric Chen, CEO of Injective Labs.

item.title: Why less may be more when building Web3
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Stephanie So
item.description: To build secure and resilient Web3 systems, transparency alone is not enough. By placing greater emphasis on simplicity, we can make the peer-review of code more effective and minimize security breaches in the Web3 space.

item.title: UK Bitcoin community reacts to incoming CBDC and digital pound rollout
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Joseph Hall
item.description: A new role, “head of CBDC,” will help the United Kingdom to “explore the case for a digital pound,” although U.K. Bitcoiners would argue that might not be necessary.

item.title: Keith Comito on the benefits of blockchain tech and decentralization in longevity research
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Garri Zmudze
item.description: The co-founder of Lifespan.io is harnessing the power of decentralization to support cutting-edge scientific and technological discoveries.

item.title: How Web3 could revolutionize loyalty programs
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brian D. Evans
item.description: Loyalty programs are great, and many consumers opt for certain brands because of these programs. But they can get better, and blockchain technology can improve.

item.title: Ripple, Binance impersonators target XRP holders via fake staking program
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: Online fraudsters attempt to lure in XRP investors by offering fake staking services with an ROI of up to 31% for a token that is not based on proof-of-stake consensus.

item.title: Smart contracts to power day-to-day Web3 company operations
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: The project aims to help decentralized autonomous companies by providing an operating system that integrates various tools for governance and management.

item.title: Bitcoin faces ‘considerable danger’ from Fed in 2023 — Lyn Alden
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: It is not all plain sailing when it comes to Bitcoin’s price recovery this year, with U.S. liquidity conditions calling the shots.

item.title: Bitcoin mining brings more than money to this East African country
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Joseph Hall
item.description: A Bitcoin mining project in a remote corner of Malawi connects more families to the grid while delivering economic empowerment to an impoverished region.
